Package Controller

package Controller
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddUpdateAppointmentController
    Controller for the Add/Update Appointment form.
    AddUpdateCustomerController
    Controller for adding or updating a customer.
    AppointmentAlertUtil
    Utility class for displaying an alert if the logged-in user has any appointments within 15 minutes of login.
    AppointmentOverviewController
    Controller for the Appointment Overview screen.
    CustomerController
    Controller for managing Customer CRUD operations and TableView.
    CustomerOverviewController
    Controller for the Customer Overview screen.
    HomeController
    HomeController manages navigation from the home screen to Appointments, Customers, and Reports windows.
    LoginController
    Controller for the login screen.
    ReportsController
    Controller for the Reports screen.
